terms_condition.description_terms: We at CORALYTICS, a platform owned and operated by Coralytics International LLC, hereinafter referred to as "CORALYTICS," "we," "us," or "our," take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use the CORALYTICS website, mobile application, and all related services (collectively, the "Services").
terms_condition.desc_introduction: We at CORALYTICS, a platform owned and operated by Coralytics International LLC, hereinafter referred to as "CORALYTICS," "we," "us," or "our," take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use the CORALYTICS website, mobile application, and all related services (collectively, the "Services").
terms_condition.accessing_or_using_services: By accessing or using the Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these Terms, you may not use the Services. You represent and warrant that you are of legal age to enter into this agreement and have the full authority to do so.
terms_condition.access_certain_features_of_services: To access certain features of the Services, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your password, and for all activity that occurs under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security. We cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with these obligations.
terms_condition.services_may_allow_you_to_submit: The Services may allow you to submit, upload, or post content ("User Content"). You retain all ownership rights to your User Content, but you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, perpetual, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, publish, distribute, and display your User Content in connection with the Services. You represent and warrant that your User Content does not violate the rights of any third party and that you have all necessary permissions to grant us the licenses herein.
terms_condition.uploading_posting_transmitting: Uploading, posting, or transmitting any content that is illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, hateful, or racially or ethnically offensive.
terms_condition.impersonating_person_entity: Impersonating any person or entity, including us or our employees or representatives.
terms_condition.interfering_with_disrupting: Interfering with or disrupting the Services or any servers or networks connected to the Services.
terms_condition.using_the_ervices_to_exploit: Using the Services to exploit, harm, or defraud others.
terms_condition.violating_any_intellectual_property: Violating any intellectual property rights or other rights of any third party.
terms_condition.attempting_to_gain_unauthorized: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to the Services or any part thereof.
terms_condition.reserve_the_right_to_terminate: We reserve the right to terminate your access to the Services for any reason, at any time, without notice.
terms_condition.the_services_and_their_content: The Services and their content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, trademarks, and software, are owned by us or our licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use any of our intellectual property without our express written permission.
terms_condition.the_services_are_provided: The Services are provided "as is" and without warranty of any kind, express or implied. We disclaim all warranties, including, but not limited to, warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. We do not warrant that the Services will be uninterrupted or error-free, or that any defects will be corrected.
terms_condition.the_maximum_extent_permitted: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with the use of the Services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.
terms_condition.you_agree_to_indemnify_and_hold_us_harml: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from and against any and all claims, losses, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses (including attorneys' fees) arising out of or in connection with your use of the Services or your violation of these Terms.
terms_condition.terms_shall_be_governed: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United Arab Emirates, without regard to its conflict of laws provisions. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these Terms shall be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Dubai, United Arab Emirates.
terms_condition.terms_constitute_the_entire_agreement: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and us with respect to your use of the Services. Any prior or contemporaneous agreements, representations, and understandings, whether written or oral, are superseded by these Terms.
terms_condition.we_reserve_the_right_to_amend: We reserve the right to amend these Terms at any time by posting the amended Terms on the Services. You are responsible for reviewing the Terms regularly. Your continued use of the Services after the posting of amended Terms constitutes your acceptance of such amendments.
terms_condition.if_you_have_any_questions_about_these: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at
terms_condition.let_s_talk_to_us: Let’s talk to us, share your dream projects and we will transform it into reality

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.subtitle: At CORALYTICS, we take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting your personal information. Learn how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: We at CORALYTICS, a platform owned and operated by Coralytics International LLC, hereinafter referred to as "CORALYTICS," "we," "us," or "our," take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use the CORALYTICS website, mobile application, and all related services (collectively, the "Services").

informationWeCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect various types of personal information from you when you use the Services, including:

pii.title: Personally Identifiable Information (PII)
pii.description: Information that can be used to identify you directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, mailing address, IP address, and device ID.

npii.title: Non-Personally Identifiable Information (NPII)
npii.description: Information that cannot be used to identify you directly, such as your browser type, language preferences, usage data, and device information.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use your personal information for various purposes, including:
purposes: To provide and operate the Services
To send you important information about the Services and updates
To respond to your inquiries and requests
To analyze how you use the Services

howWeShare.title: 4. How We Share Your Information
howWeShare.content: We may share your personal information with third-party service providers who help us operate the Services. These service providers are bound by contractual obligations to keep your information confidential and to use it only for the purposes we authorize.
howWeShare.legal: We may also disclose your personal information if required by law, such as in response to a court order or subpoena.

yourChoices.title: 5. Your Choices
yourChoices.content: You have certain choices regarding your personal information, including:
choices: You can access and update your personal information in your account settings.
You can unsubscribe from marketing emails by clicking the "unsubscribe" link in the email.
You can delete your account by contacting us at info@coralytics.com

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your personal information.

internationalTransfers.title: 7. International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your personal information may be transferred to and stored in countries outside of your country. These countries may have different data protection laws than your country. By using the Services, you consent to the transfer of your personal information to these countries.

childrensPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: The Services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us at info@coralytics.com. We will take steps to remove the information from our systems.

changesToPolicy.title: 9. Changes to this Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Policy on the Services. You are advised to review this Policy periodically for any changes.

contactUs.title: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about this Policy, please contact us:

hero.subtitle: Stop managing technology. Start building relationships. Coraly handles the busywork so you can focus on deals.
hero.disclaimer: *Results based on user reports and may vary depending on market conditions, property type, and individual usage. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
hero.imgAlt: Before and after: Stressed agent vs successful agent closing deals

socialProof.title: Join 1,200+ Real Estate Professionals Who've Reclaimed Their Time
socialProof.subtitle: Used by top agents and agencies across Dubai, London, and beyond

CRMIntegration.keepUsingCRM: Keep using the CRM you love - Coraly enhances what you already have
CRMIntegration.worksWith: Works with Leading CRM Platforms Internationally and Locally
CRMIntegration.biDirectional: Bi-directional sync - Data flows both ways automatically
CRMIntegration.noMigration: No migration needed - Keep your existing setup
CRMIntegration.customMapping: Custom field mapping - Match your CRM structure

coreFeatures.heroTitle: While Your Competitors Struggle With Manual Work,
coreFeatures.heroHighlight: You Could Be Closing 3x More Deals

create.title: From Hours to Seconds: Professional Listings That Sell Faster

publish.title: Maximum Exposure = Maximum Offers = Maximum Commissions

convert.title: Never Miss a Lead Again
convert.subtitle: AI answers, qualifies, and books appointments 24/7

benefits.moreLeads: 60% more qualified leads outside business hours
benefits.autoBooking: Automatic appointment booking while you sleep

testimonial.quote: I wake up to 3 qualified appointments every morning. It's like having a sales team that never sleeps.
testimonial.author: — Maria S., Dubai

demo.watchStaging: Watch professional staging happen in real-time
demo.watchGlobal: Watch your listing go live across 100+ portals
demo.livePortals: Live on 100+ portals • Reaching 50M+ monthly searchers
